name: Dazl
tagline: The next era of vibe coding: visually edit everything
description: Dazl combines generative AI with hands-on editing tools. Build apps, then refine every detail through chat, visual panels, or code. Get full visibility into how your product is built and the control to edit until it’s exactly how you imagined.

name: Ancher
tagline: Your Chief of Staff for information to help you stay focused
description: Most feeds keep you scrolling — filled with algorithmic junk, drug-like short videos, and endless echo chambers. Ancher, instead, keeps you growing. It helps you anchor what matters — learning your intent, filtering the noise, and delivering insights that help you think and act. In Do Mode, explore both sides of a story, see how people react, turn articles into your own post, or let Ancher watch it for you — alerting you when a real breakthrough lands.

name: Golf
tagline: The enterprise firewall for MCP providers
description: Golf Firewall is the security layer for companies exposing MCP servers. It protects your MCP server from serving malicious or sensitive data - blocking prompt injections, PII leaks, and credential exposure before they reach customer agents.

name: Fire Your QA Today
tagline: Automate QA testing with AI
description: Turn your screen recording into a fully autonomous QA agent. Automate testing for your web apps, internal tools, CRMs, and ERPs without scripts or APIs.

name: BeeBot for AirPods
tagline: Your social audio guide to the city
description: It’s like having that friend who knows everything that’s happening, except it whispers directly into your ears as you walk around. BeeBot gives you a few short updates a day about people, places, and things nearby, emceed by your host, DJ BeeBot. BeeBot turns on automatically when you put your headphones in and stays quiet when you take them off. You can check in with DJ BeeBot to share what you’re doing or what’s happening nearby — BeeBot shares your updates with friends and other users nearby.

name: Helicone.ai
tagline: The open-source AI gateway for AI-native startups
description: The open-source AI gateway with built-in observability, automatic failover, and a one-line integration. Add credits, and get instant access to 100+ models through one API key. OpenAI compatible, zero markup, and trusted by teams like DeepAI, PodPitch, and Sunrun.

name: iisee.me
tagline: Create your own AI generated expression grid
description: A silly AI experiment that turns your photo into a grid of faces that track your mouse. Built in under 8 hours just for fun.

name: Everywhere
tagline: Every moment,  Every place. Your AI: Everywhere
description: Everywhere is dedicated to liberating AI from browser tabs and standalone apps, making it a ubiquitous, native capability of your operating system. We believe true productivity gains stem from the seamless integration of AI with your current tasks. Unlike conventional tools like ChatGPT, Everywhere perceives and understands any content on your screen in real-time. No need to screenshot, copy, or switch apps—simply use a hotkey to get the help you need, right where you are.

name: Stream Ring by Sandbar
tagline: Capture thoughts & build ideas anywhere
description: Stream is a conversational self extension. It's designed for talking through ideas and capturing notes, with an Inner Voice personalized to you. Stream Ring is a new device for fast, private voice interactions. Hold to speak, whisper in a crowd, and control music effortlessly. No interruptions, pulling out your phone, or talking loudly in public. Now available for preorder, in limited supply

name: Melodic Mind
tagline: Create, learn, and grow as a musician
description: Melodic Mind is an all-in-one music superapp built to help you create, learn, and grow as a musician — no matter your level. It has 20+ different apps that solve every need you have and help you on your musical journey, divided across 4 categories - Studio, Instruments, Music Theory & Toolkit.

name: QuiteInbox
tagline: Take back control of your inbox
description: Unsubscribe from unwanted emails in seconds. No servers. No tracking. Everything happens locally in your browser. 100% free and open source. PS - google will throw the warning saying app is not registered, you can ignore this. if you wish to run it by yourself - you can clone the repo and use your keys :) https://github.com/Koushith/quite-inbox would love to hear your feedback

name: Packmind Open Source
tagline: Roll out coding standards safely across repos and agents
description: AI assistants code fast — but without strong and shared context, they amplify inconsistency. Packmind OSS helps teams create, scale, and govern the engineering playbook that keeps AI coding safe, consistent, and aligned with your standards.

name: agor
tagline: Orchestrate multiple AI coding agents with your team
description: Next-gen agent orchestration for AI coding. Multiplayer workspace for Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini.

name: Socialwiz Ad Animator
tagline: From image ➜ video ad. One click.
description: Drop in your image, and Socialwiz instantly brings it to life as a high-impact video ad. More motion, more engagement, zero effort — free to try now.

name: Elfsight
tagline: No-code AI widgets that engage & convert website visitors
description: Elfsight’s no-code AI widgets help your website engage, assist, and convert visitors 24/7. From human-like chatbots to calculators you can build with a single prompt — get better results with less effort.

name: Dashup AI
tagline: ⚡ Build AI-powered BI dashboards in minutes
description: Millions of small and medium businesses generate valuable data every day but few can afford a BI team to turn that data into insights. Dashup AI bridges that gap. It’s an AI-powered Business Intelligence platform that helps you build professional dashboards instantly, without coding or analysts. Upload. Pick. Choose. Done. ⚡

name: Veltrix AI
tagline: Business intelligence, finally made simple
description: The future of business intelligence is instant and visual. Veltrix lets you visualize & talk to your financial data. Unify QuickBooks, Google Drive, company files & more to ask about any KPIs and domain-specific metrics for clear real-time interactive visuals.

name: Notch
tagline: Build high-performing ads from weekly trends. Every week.
description: Notch turns any URL into high-performing static and animated ads in seconds. Built by Vinay Jain & Aman Jain (ex Meta, Twitter) to help marketers skip briefs, save time, and get data backed winning ads every time.

name: JustCall AI SDR
tagline: Go from send to scheduled meetings, 24/7
description: Your reps work hard to spark interest. Don’t let it go to waste. JustCall AI SDR instantly answers inbound leads, qualifies them automatically, and books meetings for your reps — 24/7. No missed calls, no lost pipeline. Your free trial includes 50 minutes.

name: Stingray Security Chrome Extension
tagline: In-browser A.I. protection from online threats - all free
description: Stingray Security is a powerful Chrome extension that uses advanced in-browser AI to detect and block phishing websites, fake crypto platforms, and other malicious scams in real time.

tagline: The next era of vibe coding: visually edit everything
description: Dazl combines generative AI with hands-on editing tools. Build apps, then refine every detail through chat, visual panels, or code. Get full visibility into how your product is built and the control to edit until it’s exactly how you imagined.
